head.supplied: 16/5/83 ¶ ¶ It will please you, respected Mr Tepper, that among the plants from you that were put aside for critical comparison, another has proved particularly noteworthy, it is your nos. 10, 11 & 3...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MS annotation by Tepper: 'Reply 24.5.83 with Copy of Potato Moth'. Letter not found. 16/5/83

Es wird Sie freuen, geehrter Herr Tepper, dass sich unter den Pflanzen von Ihnen, welche für kritische Vergleiche zurückgelegt waren, noch eine andere besonders merkwürdig erwiesen hat, es ist Ihre N 10, 11 & 370 von Yorke’s penins., nämlich Calocephalus Drummondi, B., welches Pflänzchen wir noch nicht ausserhalb Westaustralien kannten, wo ich es 1867 selbst an der Basis des Stirling’s Range fand.

Sollte die Missbildung an Beyera opaca wirklich von Pilzwuchs abhängen, gewöhnlich entstehen solche Wucherungen vegetativer Organe durch Insectanstiche, während Pilze zerstörend in Wachsthums Processe eingreifen. Indessen: nulla regula sine exceptione

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Könnten Sie noch einen Abdruck Ihres Aufsatzes über Kartoffel Krankheit ablassen?

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
It will please you, respected Mr Tepper, that among the plants from you that were put aside for critical comparison, another has proved particularly noteworthy, it is your nos. 10, 11 & 370 from Yorke Peninsula,
SA. namely Calocephalus drummondi B., which little plant we had not known outside Western Australia, where I found it myself at the base of the Stirling Ranges.

Should the deformity on Beyera opaca really depend on fungal growth, usually such growths of vegetative organs are caused by insect bites, whereas fungi interfere destructively in the process of growth. However: no rule without an exception.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Could you let me have another reprint of your essay on potato disease.
Tepper (1882c).

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic;
